name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text:
"Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison."
—Sarkhan Vol

name: Aether Adept
oracle_text: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Some mages do their best work in solitude. Others do their best work creating it.

name: Ajani's Mantra
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."
—Zaliki of Naya

name: Arc Runner
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Arc Runner.
flavor_text: The storms of the wastelands form quickly and hit hard. Few have anything to do with rain.

name: Armored Cancrix
flavor_text: Creatures displaced from time still turn up every year, stranded by the temporal disaster that once swept across Dominaria.

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
—Yurin, royal assassin

name: Assault Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Fine soldiers guarded the northern front. They waited for two-legged foes and left the skies unheeded."
—General Avitora

name: Augury Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Azure Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: More so than "storm" or "pirate," "drake" is the word a sailor least wants to hear.

name: Barony Vampire
flavor_text: "Poor little sun-dweller out past curfew. And to think, you might have survived if it wasn't so close to suppertime."

name: Berserkers of Blood Ridge
oracle_text: Berserkers of Blood Ridge attacks each combat if able.
flavor_text: They take a blood oath to die in battle. So far none have failed to fulfill the promise.

name: Blinding Mage
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
flavor_text: "I carry the light of truth. Do not pity those it blinds, for they never had eyes to see."

name: Bloodcrazed Goblin
oracle_text: Bloodcrazed Goblin can't attack unless an opponent has been dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text:
"A single drop of blood draws their attention, then they strip your bones clean before you have time to die."
—Jamias, hermit of Telfer Peak

name: Bloodthrone Vampire
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Bloodthrone Vampire gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The underclass often forget that they are not tenants, or servants, but property."

name: Blood Tithe
oracle_text: Each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
flavor_text: The Crimson Throne may be empty, but its coffers are full.

name: Bog Raiders
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Zombies are the perfect marshland fighters—they don't need to breathe and they don't care what they step in.

name: Brindle Boar
oracle_text: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.
flavor_text: The war lasted for generations. The boars didn't need to hunt for food anymore. They fed on the fallen corpses, and the living fed off of them.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Canyon Minotaur
flavor_text:
"We'll scale these cliffs, traverse Brittle Bridge, and then fight our way down the volcanic slopes on the other side."
"Isn't the shortest route through the canyon?"
"Yes."
"So shouldn't we—"
"No."

name: Chandra's Outrage
oracle_text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.
flavor_text:
"Her mind is an incredible mix of emotion and power. Even if I could grasp it, I couldn't hold it for long."
—Jace Beleren, on Chandra Nalaar

name: Child of Night
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: A vampire enacts vengeance on the entire world, claiming her debt two tiny pinpricks at a time.

name: Cloud Crusader
oracle_text:
Flying
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Each crusader bonds with a griffin fledgling while still a child, and the two grow up as siblings.

name: Cloud Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"The sky teems with just as much life as the forest or the deep seas."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.

name: Diminish
oracle_text: Target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"'That was a narrow escape!' said Alice, a good deal frightened at the sudden change, but very glad to find herself still in existence."
—Lewis Carroll,
*Alice's Adventures in Wonderland*

name: Disentomb
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The armies of the dead always report well rested.

name: Doom Blade
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

name: Dryad's Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has forestwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: She grants knowledge of the ways to traverse the forest's invisible connections.

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."
—Liliana Vess

name: Excommunicate
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"Our law prohibits capital punishment. We believe even the gravest offenders have the chance to redeem themselves."
—Torian Sha, soul warden

name: Fiery Hellhound
oracle_text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."
—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

name: Fling
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor_text: Sometimes the cannoneer must become the cannonball.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
flavor_text:
"I fear no army or beast, but only the morning fog. Our assault can survive everything else."
—Lord Hilneth

name: Foresee
oracle_text: Scry 4, then draw two cards.
flavor_text: Two eyes to see what could be, two eyes to see what will.

name: Garruk's Companion
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: The giant spider's silk naturally resists gravity, almost weaving itself as it blankets the forest canopy.

name: Goblin Balloon Brigade
oracle_text: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The enemy is getting too close! Quick! Inflate the toad!"

name: Goblin Piker
flavor_text: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

name: Goblin Tunneler
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"You never know what's going to be in goblin tunnels. Even in the best case, there will still be goblins."
—Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

name: Goldenglow Moth
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Goldenglow Moth blocks, you may gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"Little moth, fluttering bright, What luck will you bring tonight?"
—Benalish children's rhyme

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Only a thin layer of dirt separates civilization from an undead apocalypse.

name: Greater Basilisk
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

name: Harbor Serpent
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

name: Holy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text:
"Born under the sun, the first child will seek the foundation of honor and be fortified by its righteousness."
—Codex of the Constellari

name: Hornet Sting
oracle_text: Hornet Sting deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: It was only then—to his infinite sorrow—that Gork realized hornets don't make honey.

name: Hunters' Feast
oracle_text: Any number of target players each gain 6 life.
flavor_text: Those who kill a jawspur rhino must prepare spells to lift the carcass—even a dozen hunters can't lift its bulk.

name: Ice Cage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

name: Incite
oracle_text: Target creature becomes red until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
flavor_text: The veneer of rationality peeled from the mage, revealing the spite and rage beneath.

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Any fool can pick up a sword and charge into battle. To emerge alive at the end, that is a gift that comes from leadership and experience."

name: Inspired Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!"
—General Avitora

name: Jace's Erasure
oracle_text: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player mill a card.
flavor_text: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: From the heart of the mountain into the heart of the mage.

name: Lightning Bolt
oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Liliana's Specter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."
—Liliana Vess

name: Llanowar Elves
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor_text:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

name: Mana Leak
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
flavor_text: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

name: Manic Vandal
oracle_text: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

name: Maritime Guard
flavor_text: Once common in the Kapsho Seas, merfolk were hunted almost to extinction. They survived those dark days and emerged calculating and determined to endure.

name: Merfolk Spy
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Whenever Merfolk Spy deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals a card at random from their hand.

name: Mighty Leap
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly."
—Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text: Not every thought is a good one.

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Nature does not need adornment."
—Garruk Wildspeaker

name: Negate
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

name: Nether Horror
flavor_text:
"My dreams darkened and seeped into my waking hours. Spellcraft and nightmare merged to create this monstrosity."
—Sunniva, witch of Holm Hollow

name: Nightwing Shade
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{B}: Nightwing Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"There is one hour of the night even we do not watch."
—Sedva, captain of the watch

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

name: Palace Guard
oracle_text: Palace Guard can block any number of creatures.
flavor_text: "I'm not nearly as bothered by being outnumbered as I am by their foul stench."

name: Phantom Beast
oracle_text: When Phantom Beast becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text: As insubstantial as fear, and as dangerous.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: "You are the grandest of all," said the archdruid to the trees. They became so proud of bark and branch that they suffered no creature to fly overhead or perch upon a bough.

name: Preordain
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Primal Cocoon
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature attacks or blocks, sacrifice Primal Cocoon.

name: Pyretic Ritual
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: The Multiverse is filled with limitless power just waiting for someone to reach out and seize it.

name: Quag Sickness
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each Swamp you control.
flavor_text: The dread gases didn't kill Farbid. But as he lay in the muck, miserable and helpless, watching ghouls and rats advance on him, he wished they had.

name: Rotting Legion
oracle_text: Rotting Legion enters the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: Zombies have one speed: shamble.

name: Runeclaw Bear
flavor_text:
"Nature has grown tired of the impositions of men and will begin to outfit its creations with tools for bloody instruction."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Sacred Wolf
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string."
—Aref the Hunter

name: Safe Passage
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
flavor_text: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

name: Scroll Thief
oracle_text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor_text: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

name: Siege Mastodon
flavor_text:
"The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!"
—General Avitora

name: Sign in Blood
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

name: Silvercoat Lion
flavor_text:
"In the wild, white fur like mine is an aberration. We lack natural camouflage, but the inability to hide encourages other strengths."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Solemn Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"A relic donation is suggested."
"The suggestion is mandatory."
—Temple signs

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text:
"They're as much like plants as animals. Leave them unchecked, and they'll choke out all other forms of life."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist

name: Squadron Hawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Squadron Hawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Squadron Hawk, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Stabbing Pain
oracle_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Tap that creature.
flavor_text:
"You can take the fight out of nearly any creature if you know where its soft spot is."
—Guttor, flesh-warper

name: Stormfront Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come."
—Stormfront fable

name: Sylvan Ranger
oracle_text: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

name: Thunder Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: Lightning reflexes, thunderous might.

name: Tireless Missionaries
oracle_text: When Tireless Missionaries enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: If they succeed in their holy work, their order will vanish into welcome obscurity, for there will be no more souls to redeem.

name: Tome Scour
oracle_text: Target player mills five cards.
flavor_text: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.

name: Unholy Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.
flavor_text:
"Born under the moon, the second child will stumble on temptation and seek power in the dark places of the heart."
—Codex of the Constellari

name: Unsummon
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"You're trespassing in my reality. Ask permission next time."
—Simun the Quiet

name: Viscera Seer
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: In matters of life and death, he trusts his gut.

name: Volcanic Strength
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has mountainwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: His blood boiled over, and he erupted with fists of stone.

name: Vulshok Berserker
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: He will carve out a legend for himself with his own two hands.

name: Wall of Vines
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Farmers typically keep their flocks at thirteen sheep—one to distract the griffins while they take the other twelve to market.

name: Yavimaya Wurm
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: Anywhere else, colossal. In the forests of Yavimaya, commonplace.
